devdoc.author: Zondax AG
devdoc.details: methods in this library try to read the data type indicated from cbor encoded data stored in bytes at a specific indexif it successes, methods will return the read value and the new index (intial index plus read bytes)

userdoc.notice: This library is a set a functions that allows anyone to decode cbor encoded bytes
